components.aiNotes: Price should be in whole dollars, not micro-units. Features array should be simple strings.

commonIssues.aiTip: Always check connection status before attempting subscription operations. AI agents should add connection checks.

commonIssues.solution: Use whole dollar amounts, not micro-units
commonIssues.aiTip: SubscriptionCard expects whole dollar amounts. The SDK handles micro-unit conversion automatically.
